Transforming Media and OTT Delivery with NMC CDN Services

CLIENT: A Leading OTT Streaming Platform in Asia

  • Industry: Media and Entertainment
  • Objective: Deliver seamless streaming experiences, improve content accessibility, and scale for global audiences.

Challenges

Buffering Issues

Users frequently experienced buffering during peak hours, resulting in poor viewer satisfaction and churn

Global Expansion Barriers

Expanding to international markets required a reliable delivery infrastructure to cater to audiences across diverse regions

High Data Transmission Costs

Streaming high-quality video content (HD, 4K, and VR) significantly increased bandwidth usage and operational expenses

NMC CDN Solution

High-Performance Streaming Infrastructure

  • Deployed NMC CDNs global network of edge servers to deliver low-latency video streams.
  • Optimized video delivery with adaptive bitrate streaming to ensure uninterrupted playback across varying network conditions.

Regional Caching for Global Reach

  • Leveraged localized caching in target markets to reduce latency and improve accessibility.
  • Ensured smooth delivery of regional content through geo-redundant servers.

Cost-Effective Bandwidth Management

  • Implemented real-time compression for video files without compromising quality, reducing bandwidth consumption by 30%.
  • Introduced pay-as-you-go pricing for flexible scaling during high-demand periods.

RESULTS: Achieved

Enhanced Streaming Experience
  • Reduced buffering instances by 70%, ensuring smooth video playback.
  • Delivered HD and 4K video streams with a 40% improvement in load times.
Seamless Global Expansion
  • Successfully launched services in 15 new countries with consistent user experiences.
  • Increased international audience engagement by 50%.
Significant Cost Savings
  • Reduced bandwidth costs by 35% through advanced compression and caching.
  • Optimized resource utilization to minimize operational expenses.
Improved Security and Compliance
  • Eliminated piracy incidents with robust DRM and tokenized access.
  • Achieved compliance with regional data protection regulations, enhancing trust with users and partners.
Boosted Viewer Engagement
  • Personalized recommendations increased viewer retention by 25%.
  • Achieved a 20% uplift in average watch time per user.

Why Choose NMC CDN Services for Media and OTT?

  • Unmatched Performance: Deliver high-quality video streams with low latency, even during peak hours.
  • Global Reach: A robust network of edge servers ensures seamless content delivery worldwide
  • Cost Efficiency: Optimize bandwidth usage and control expenses with real-time compression and caching.
  • Content Security: Advanced DRM and token-based access safeguard your premium assets.
  • Personalization: Enhance viewer engagement with tailored recommendations powered by actionable insights.

Client : Testimonial

NMC CDN Services has been a game-changer for our OTT platform. Their solutions not only resolved our streaming issues but also enabled us to expand globally while keeping costs under control. The personalized experiences we now offer have set us apart in a competitive market.
Head of TechnologyLeading OTT Platform
